title: Circular Design Helps Homeowners Waste Less, Preserve More - National Association of REALTORSÂ®
summary: Circular design focuses on reducing waste by prioritizing recycled and recyclable materials, timeless design, and durable construction. This design philosophy is a subset of sustainable design, which emphasizes minimizing environmental impact, and can be incorporated into homes through various strategies such as vintage shopping, using certified and reclaimed materials, and investing in high-quality, long-lasting pieces.
